channel.title: Multi combat zones
channel.description:
In my server I have bosses such as kdb and the chaos elemental. These bosses are way to good for one player to kill by them selves. So i put the bosses all over the game in different caves and what not. but the caves i put them in are not multi combat. I was wondering how to make my own multi combat zones.
Thank you, possum

item.title: Multi combat zones
item.dc:creator: @tumor tumor
item.description:
@tumor wrote:

In my server I have bosses such as kdb and the chaos elemental. These bosses are way to good for one player to kill by them selves.
